taskRoles.name: ps
taskRoles.command: pip install tqdm && cd /userhome && wget -c https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Leinao/LeinaoPAI/master/example/tensorflow-distributed/mnist_replica.py && python /userhome/mnist_replica.py  --num_gpus=0 --batch_size=32 --data_dir=/gdata/MNIST  --train_dir=/userhome/tensorflow-distributed/output --ps_hosts=$PAI_TASK_ROLE_ps_HOST_LIST --worker_hosts=$PAI_TASK_ROLE_worker_HOST_LIST --job_name=ps --task_index=$PAI_CURRENT_TASK_ROLE_CURRENT_TASK_INDEX

taskRoles.name: worker
taskRoles.command: pip install tqdm && cd /userhome && wget -c https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Leinao/LeinaoPAI/master/example/tensorflow-distributed/mnist_replica.py && python /userhome/mnist_replica.py  --num_gpus=2 --batch_size=32 --data_dir=/gdata/MNIST  --train_dir=/userhome/tensorflow-distributed/output --ps_hosts=$PAI_TASK_ROLE_ps_HOST_LIST --worker_hosts=$PAI_TASK_ROLE_worker_HOST_LIST --job_name=worker --task_index=$PAI_CURRENT_TASK_ROLE_CURRENT_TASK_INDEX
